Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Detroit in 1967...
Injured on 4/13/1969 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 4/1/1970 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/31/1970...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1970, winning 2 games with a 2.16 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/22/1972, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1976, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Injured on 7/23/1977 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1979, winning 2 games with a 2.00 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Cy Young Award in 1979, going 26-6, 3.17 ERA...
